function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited space and inadequate rooms in apartments making it uncomfortable for residents","Impact":"Increased physical and mental fatigue, decreased well-being","Mitigation":"Redesigning apartment units to optimize space and comfort","Technologies":"Smart home technologies, space-saving furniture","People":"Residents of apartments","Owner":"Architects, interior designers"},{"Description":"Potential for virus spread in apartment sharing systems such as ducting, shafts, or corridors","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air purification technology","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, UV-C lighting","People":"Residents of apartments, building management","Owner":"Property management, building maintenance"},{"Description":"Need to adjust apartment design to increase resilience towards COVID-19 and improve resident comfort","Impact":"Risk of ongoing discomfort and vulnerability to pandemics","Mitigation":"Integrating biophilic design principles, implementing health protocols","Technologies":"Biophilic design elements, health monitoring systems","People":"Architects, interior designers, residents of apartments","Owner":"Architects, property developers"}]}
